name: Hat-tricks
description:
Think wand-like and try to escape a box of magical hats, but where exactly is the escape hat(ch)? A puzzling logic-maze mini-game and a phenomenally late non-entry to  Thinky Puzzle Game Jam 2.

  • Number of puzzles: 16
  • Average play time: 1h+
  • First published: September 2022
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] to undo; [R] for restart.
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.
  • Hackable source:  click here

Brought to you with thanks to Clement Sparrow, maintainer of Pattern:Script, and to members of the thinky-puzzle-games discord for play-testing.
